articles.title: Care home deaths in county reach 145 - NW Evening Mail
articles.description: COVID-19 has probably claimed the lives of 145 care home residents in Cumbria, officials have confirmed.
articles.content:
COVID-19 has probably claimed the lives of 145 care home residents in Cumbria, officials have confirmed.

articles.author: Adam Chapman
articles.title: How to live longer: Follow this specific diet to lower your risk of early death - Express
articles.description: HOW to live longer: If you are looking to lead a long life, eating a healthy, balanced diet is the hard and fast rule to live by. The best diet to follow is still debated vigorously but there is a broad consensus emerging.

articles.title: Coronavirus Treatment: Blood Thinners Can Boost Survival Of COVID-19 Patients, Study Reveals - Medical Daily
articles.description: Blood thinners, which are used to slow down clotting, can effectively treat and manage patients of coronavirus as soon as they are admitted to the hospital.
articles.content:
Amidst the increasing number of COVID-19 deaths around the world, physicians at one of New York Citys major hospital systems have indicated the possibilities of anticoagulants or blood thinners being effective in boosting the coronavirus survival rates.

articles.title: Lockdown could be needlessly prolonged because of ministers' obsession with 'irrelevant' R-value - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Government is relying on the 'R' figure - the average number of people a coronavirus patient infects - to tell them when it is safe to unlock the UK. But experts have said the measure it is 'too crude'.

articles.title: It’s in your genes — Whether Covid lands you in hospital or not depends on your body - ThePrint
